https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/3VwgQmEtYekdIBugEXHiFOgNHij.jpg Raina embarks on an affair with the tortured Nick. The compulsion towards excessive behaviour forms the nexus of their relationship. Isabelle is bound up in a lifeless marriage. The two women meet in a church. Their physical contact begins as a caress but ends in a fit of aggression. Both Ends Burning
